category: Member city/provincial sports association regulations/Article 7 (Rights and obligations of member organizations)
contents: Article 7 (Rights and Obligations of Member Organizations) Article 10 of the Sports Association Articles of Incorporation shall apply mutatis mutandis to the rights and obligations of city/provincial sports association member organizations toward the city/provincial sports association. Revised 2021. 10. 6., 2023. 7. 5.
